citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 8:55 AM on April 30,
2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by telephone and email. Failure to provide access to the
facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result
in enforcement action.
Additional Inspectors:
KRISTIN NAPOLI, SUPERVISORY ANIMAL CARE SPECIALISTEnd Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 8:55 AM on April 30, 
2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by telephone and email. Failure to provide access to the 
facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result 
in enforcement action. 
 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
KRISTIN NAPOLI, SUPERVISORY ANIMAL CARE SPECIALISTEnd Section
